February 12, 2019 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Understanding Airbnb’s Growth Tactics As Airbnb continues to challenge hospitality companies across the globe, the ability to understand its tactics becomes increasingly important. In this infographic, we explore just how much growth Airbnb saw in 2018, and what it did to achieve it. We cover growth stats and strategies, along with actual conversions to learn how hospitality businesses can adapt to their changing landscape. by Liron Hakim Bobrov Marketing Insights Manager at Similarweb Liron, with over 5 years of experience and an MBA from Tel Aviv University, specializes in content management, data analysis, and industry insights.
